title: Hurricane Season: A Collection of Short Stories
description: Strong women donâ€™t always mean to be that way. They just take care of things. They can change the world, or at least their little part of it, and become agents of change to make it a better place. These fantasy and science fiction stories by Lela Buis bring you strong women in lives filled with adventure. Stories: Ground Zero, Possession, Nightside, Mixed Heritage, The Hatchling, Dragon Rain, The Winter People, Hurricane Season. Includes strong language and sexual situations.
author: Lela E. Buis
